AxLabel.Name: UseActivityGrouping
AxLabel.Label: Use activity grouping for project invoice proposals

AxLabel.Name: UseActivityGroupingHelp
AxLabel.Label: When enabled, invoice proposals will be grouped by activity number in addition to standard grouping criteria

AxLabel.Name: ActivityNumberHelp
AxLabel.Label: Project activity associated with this invoice proposal

AxLabel.Name: ActivityGroupingInfo
AxLabel.Label: Invoice proposals are grouped by activity number

AxLabel.Name: TransactionsWithActivityOnly
AxLabel.Label: Only transactions with assigned activity numbers will be included

AxLabel.Name: ActivityGroupingEnabled
AxLabel.Label: Activity-based filtering enabled for this project

AxLabel.Name: ActivityGroupingDisabled
AxLabel.Label: Standard invoice proposal creation (activity filtering disabled)
